name: ST. CHARLES COUNTY DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS
sampleDescriptions: Assist the St. Charles County Department of Corrections with issues related to the re-negotiation of its US Marshals Service Intergovernmental Agreement for housing federal prisoners.
